segments.text: Yes , I ’ Ve come in apply for the position as head of claim department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m Smith , the manager of Human Resources Department . May I ask your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me what education background you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I graduated from Beijing College of Foreign Trade . My major was International Trade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any experience in this field ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have been working in Lush Insurance Company for four years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do you think you are proficient in both written and spoken English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will accept you for a three months-period of probation . Is this satisfactory ?
segments.speaker: S1
